```{r}
#library("RprobitB")
```

```{r data}
data("choice_berserk")
choice_berserk$color <- ifelse(choice_berserk$color == "white", 1, 0)
choice_berserk$lost <- ifelse(choice_berserk$streak, 1, 0)
data <- prepare_data(
  form = berserk ~ 0 | color + rating + rating_diff + min_rem + streak,
  choice_data = choice_berserk,
  id = "player_id",
  idc = "game_id",
  standardize = c("rating","rating_diff","min_rem")
)
```

```{r plot-data}
plot(data, by_choice = TRUE)
```

```{r fit}
model <- mcmc(data)
```

```{r plot-fit}
plot(coef(model))
```
